intro: Randia klossii, commonly known as the Kloss randia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species of shrubs and vines. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, clustered flowers that range from white to pink in color. Randia klossii typically grows as a shrub or small tree, often found in moist, shaded environments. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for horticultural cultivation in warm climates.
